name: NBA Showtime: NBA on NBC
overview: The NBA like you've never seen it before! NBA Showtime: NBA on NBC brings you the top players from each team in a heart-pounding, pulse-racing above-the-rim match-up! You'll see the intensity on their faces and hear it in their voices, you'll feel the power of every pass and every shot! This is what the NBA is all about! Go for rebounds and 3-pointers in all 28 arenas around the league. Choose from over 130 real NBA players plus hidden characters!
